subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Vince Carter’s 17 points led the Nets to a 96-88 victory over the Miami Heat, pulling the Nets within two games of the idle Chicago Bulls for the final Eastern Conference playoff spot.
snippet: Vince Carter’s 17 points led the Nets to a 96-88 victory over the Miami Heat, pulling the Nets within two games of the idle Chicago Bulls for the final Eastern Conference playoff spot.
